name: Item Cancels Message String
author: Bagu
info: Cancels displaying a variable screen message by checking Item ID
description: This script is primary useful, to disable strings, which include functions (like warp commands etc.).I use a string like that, to warp out, if Link enters an "underwater map", till he gets the required item...In this case, the blue tunic/armor/ring, to breathe under water.
setup: Put it in the screen script slot and set it to "run script at screen init".D0 = Item ID (the item you want to disable the message)D1 = Message String that plays till Link picks up the required item
